title: Establishes the crime of harming a police dog
summary: Establishes the crime of harming a police dog if such person kills or causes serious physical injury to a police dog knowing such dog is a police dog; makes it a class E felony.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2443

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 18, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. CASTELLI -- read once and referred to the Commit-
         tee on Codes

       AN  ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing the crime of
         harming a police dog

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1. The penal law is amended by adding a new section 270.40 to
    2  read as follows:
    3  S 270.40 HARMING A POLICE DOG.
    4    A PERSON IS GUILTY OF HARMING A  POLICE  DOG  IF  SUCH  PERSON  INTEN-
    5  TIONALLY KILLS OR CAUSES SERIOUS PHYSICAL INJURY TO A POLICE DOG KNOWING
    6  SUCH DOG TO BE A POLICE DOG.
    7    HARMING A POLICE DOG IS A CLASS E FELONY.
    8    S 2. This act shall take effect on the first of November next succeed-
    9  ing the date on which it shall have become a law.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD05581-02-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing the crime of harming a police dog
